au.edu.rmit.tzar.resultscopier

Interface ResultsCopier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AsyncResultsCopier, DbUpdatingResultsCopier, FileResultsCopier, RetryingResultsCopier, ScpResultsCopier

    public interface ResultsCopier
    Copies results from local storage to permanent storage.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void copyResults(Run run, java.io.File sourcePath, boolean success)
      Copies the sourcePath directory to the destination path for this copier.
      java.io.File getBaseDestPath()
      Gets the base destination path for this copier.

    • Method Detail

      • copyResults

        void copyResults(Run run,
               java.io.File sourcePath,
               boolean success)
                 throws TzarException
        Copies the sourcePath directory to the destination path for this copier. The destination path may be on another server, copied by a protocol specific to the implementation of this interface. Implementations should update outputHost and outputPath on the run after copying.
        Parameters:
        run - the run containing the results to be copied
        sourcePath - the path containing the run results
        success - true if the run was successful
        Throws:
        TzarException - if the files could not be copied

      • getBaseDestPath

        java.io.File getBaseDestPath()
        Gets the base destination path for this copier.
